mapper.insert: insert into reqlist(groupnum, leaderid, autoreg) value(#{groupnum}, #{leaderid}, #{autoreg})
insert into reqlist(groupnum, userid, answer) value(#{groupnum}, #{userid}, #{answer})
mapper.delete: delete from reqlist where (groupnum=#{groupnum} and userid=#{userid})
mapper.select: select * from reqlist where (groupnum=#{groupnum} and leaderid is null)
select * from reqlist where (groupnum=#{groupnum} and userid is null)
mapper.update: update reqlist set autoreg = #{autoreg} where (groupnum = #{groupnum} and userid is null)
